item.description:
This Meetup is geared towards a solid 3.5 or 4.0 (and above) for playing competitive level doubles tennis.

You should be able to play matches with the following skills:

+ able to hit first serves with power and return serves

+ can volley; Teamwork in doubles is evident.

A. Consistent strokes on both forehand and backhand sides with depth and control
B. Improved use of power & spins
C. Has a variety of shots including lobs, overheads, approach shots, and volleys
D. Hits first serves with power; Places second serves slowly; Forces errors more often
E. Seldom out of position in a doubles game.

Read more about the NTPR ratings here.

Please note that there is a sign-up limit with a waitlist, so please keep your RSVP updated. Thanks.
item.name: Advanced Intermediate Session - solid 3.5+
